title: Check us out! Great 3 BD / 2 BA by public transportation. 1385 SqFt!
map_address: 2975 Continental Colony Pkwy SW near Verdant Dr SW
posting_body: ['Welcome to Village on the Green', 'Rental Information', 'Pricing:', '$2407 - $2770/Month | 3 Bedroom 2 Bath | 1385', 'sq ft', 'Lease Term:', '6-Month, 9-Month, 12-Month', 'show contact info', 'Apartment Amenities', '● 9 Ft Ceilings', '● Black Appliances', '● Ceiling Fan', '● Crown Molding', '● Dishwasher', '● Lazy Susan Cabinet', '● Sun Rooms', '● Terrace Level', '● View', '● W/D Hookup', '● Hardwood Flooring in Select Units', '● Individual Alarm Systems Available', '● Large Thermal Windows in Each Home', '● Washer-Dryer Connections in Walk-in Laundry Room', '● Wired for High-Speed Internet & Cable TV', 'Community Features', '● Business Center', '● Car Care Center', '● Courtyard', '● Fitness Center', '● Pet Friendly', '● Playground', '● Pool', '● Public Transportation', '● Shopping Nearby', '● Tennis Court', '● Accepts Credit Card Payments', '● Attached Garages', '● Close to East Lake, and The Camp Creek Marketplace', '● Close to Hartsfield Jackson International Airport', '● Controlled Access/Gated', '● Freeway Access', '● Quaint Location', '● Resort-Style Pool', '● Roommate-Style Floor Plans Available', '● State-of-the-Art Cardio and Strength Center', 'About Community', 'Description:', 'Life is meant to be enjoyed.', 'Finding a home to be enjoyed is as important as anything in life.', 'Village on the Green will help you enjoy life with its fantastic amenities, quaint location, and spacious floor plans.', 'These apartments for rent in Atlanta, GA are the perfect fit for you and your family.', "We're close to East Lake, Hartsfield Jackson International Airport and The Camp Creek Marketplace, ensuring a convenient home that you will love.", 'Location:', '2975 Continental Colony Pkwy SW', 'Atlanta, GA 30331', 'show contact info', 'Office Hours:', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Additional Information', 'Pet Policy:', 'Breed Restriction;Weight Restriction;Pets - allowed, Max weight 50 lb each, One time Fee $350.00, Rent $15.00', 'Comments: Cats and dogs are welcome.', 'Dog breeds that are known to be aggressive are strictly prohibited.', '350.00 non-refundable pet deposit per pet.', 'Pets must be at least 12 months with vet records.', 'Restrictions: Pit Bull, Rottweiler, Chow, Doberman Pinscher, Akita', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Our Management Company:', 'Peak Living', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '068B5DA19D054843']
